mapper.update: UPDATE product_order SET `consignment` = 1, `consignment_time` = now() where `consignment` = 0 and `product_id` = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT po.id AS id, po.product_id AS product_id, po.points AS points, po.num AS num, po.total_points AS total_points, po.created_time AS created_time, po.created_by AS created_by, p.product_name AS product_name FROM product_order po JOIN product p ON po.product_id = p.id UNION ALL SELECT po.id AS id, po.product_id AS product_id, po.points AS points, po.num AS num, po.total_points AS total_points, po.created_time AS created_time, po.created_by AS created_by, CASE p.coupon_type WHEN 'RED_ENVELOPE' THEN CONCAT(truncate((p.amount/100),2),'元现金红包') WHEN 'INTEREST_COUPON' THEN CONCAT((p.rate*100),'%加息券') WHEN 'INVEST_COUPON' THEN CONCAT(truncate((p.amount/100),2),'元投资体验券') ELSE '其他' END AS product_name FROM product_order po JOIN coupon p ON po.product_id = p.id ) pr WHERE pr.created_by = #{loginName} ORDER BY pr.created_time DESC LIMIT #{index}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT po.id AS id, po.product_id AS product_id, po.points AS points, po.num AS num, po.total_points AS total_points, po.created_time AS created_time, po.created_by AS created_by, p.name AS name FROM product_order po JOIN product p ON po.product_id = p.id UNION ALL SELECT po.id AS id, po.product_id AS product_id, po.points AS points, po.num AS num, po.total_points AS total_points, po.created_time AS created_time, po.created_by AS created_by, CASE p.coupon_type WHEN 'RED_ENVELOPE' THEN CONCAT(truncate((p.amount/100),2),'元现金红包') WHEN 'INTEREST_COUPON' THEN CONCAT((p.rate*100),'%加息券') WHEN 'INVEST_COUPON' THEN CONCAT(truncate((p.amount/100),2),'元投资体验券') ELSE '其他' END AS name FROM product_order po JOIN coupon p ON po.product_id = p.id ) pr WHERE pr.created_by = #{loginName}
